Credits.Value:
#Crédits, Thanks to: - My dear daughter waiting about her father, meanwhile i pack roms... In order to make her discover my youthness. - My ex/wife (she don't want to leave but it's useful, it's something between us) :D. - My beloved cats, those again here, those who left to early ... - DotNetZip creator, very good job, amazing ! - SevenZip creator, big thanks & bravo !
Greetings.

Help.Value:
Step to the left, step to the righ, clap your hands....Ok... sorry...
It's a bacic to help you.
What is it for... nothing, get out of the way ^^: - In short, it get ONE rom, its images and its xml data to build a compressed file with everything. - Be careful, it will not be the same structure but (update) the unpacker is out to help you if you want to reinject - No, it does not affect your info, files, images, etc.
#1: Go to settings to select the Lauchbox folder.
#2: Select an output directory where to put the pack !!! DON'T SELECT the LauncherBox folder !!!
#3: Optional you can specify the compression algorithm
#4: The following steps are intuitive, you select the machine, then the game ... go.

L_Games.Value: Are you sure to want to pack this games ?

TwoRulz.Value:
Two rules: - Each Manual must be in a folder having the same system name AS the name in launchbox. ex: F:\CheadCodes\Sega Megadrive\ && in LaunchBox the system is named Sega Megadrive => Enter F:\CheadCodes\ 
-To select the manuals, they must have a name beginning by the Name of the game + "-" + (optionnal)something ex: For Sonic, Cheadcode archive must begin by 'Sonic-'

Note: As much archive as you want.
